## 练习与作业1：基础做图 & ggplot2

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### **用`swiss`数据做图**

1.  用直方图`histogram`显示 `Catholic` 列的分布情况；
2.  用散点图显示`Eduction`与`Fertility`的关系；将表示两者关系的线性公式、相关系数和p值画在图的空白处。

注：每种图提供**基础做图函数**和**ggplot2**两个版本！

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
library(ggplot2)
data(swiss)

# Basic
# Task 01
  hist(
    swiss$Catholic, 
    main="Distribution of Catholic(Basic Method)", 
    xlab="Catholic")

# Task 02
# Plotting Scatter Plots
plot(
  swiss$Education, 
  swiss$Fertility, 
  main = "Education vs Fertility(Basic Method)",
  xlab = "Education",
  ylab = "Fertility", 
  pch = 16, 
  col = "blue")

# Adding a linear regression line
abline(
  lm(swiss$Fertility ~ swiss$Education),
  col = "red")

# Add correlation coefficients and p-values
cor_val =
  cor(swiss$Fertility, 
      swiss$Education)
p_val =
  cor.test(swiss$Fertility, 
           swiss$Education)$p.value
legend(
  "topright", 
  legend = paste("Correlation =", 
                 round(cor_val, 2), 
                 "\n", "p-value =",
                 round(p_val, 4)), 
  bty = "n", 
  col = "red")

# ggplot2
# Task 01
ggplot(
  swiss, 
  aes(x = Catholic)) +
  geom_histogram(
    fill = "lightblue", 
    color = "black",
    bins = 20) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Catholic(ggplot2)", 
    x = "Catholic", 
    y = "Frequency")

# Task 02
# 使用 ggplot2 绘制散点图
ggplot(
  swiss, 
  aes(x = Education, 
      y = Fertility)) +
  geom_point(
    color = "blue",
    size = 3) +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm",
    color = "red") +
  labs(
    title = "Education vs Fertility(ggplot2)", 
    x = "Education", 
    y = "Fertility") +
  annotate(
    "text",
    x = 20, 
    y = 35, 
    label = 
      paste(
        "Correlation =", 
        round(cor_val, 2),
        "\n", 
        "p-value =", 
        round(p_val, 4)),
    color = "red",
    vjust = -1, 
    size = 3)

```

### **用`iris`作图**

1.  用散点图显示 `Sepal.Length` 和 `Petal.Length` 之间的关系；按 `species` 为散点确定颜色，并画出 legend 以显示 `species` 对应的颜色； 如下图所示： ![](images/talk09-homework-plot02.png)
2.  用 boxplot 显示`species`之间 `Sepal.Length` 的分布情况；

注：每种图提供**基础做图函数**和**ggplot2**两个版本！

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
data(iris)
library(ggplot2)

# Basic
# Task 01
colors =
  c("setosa" = "red",
    "versicolor" = "green",
    "virginica" = "blue")
plot(
  iris$Sepal.Length,
  iris$Petal.Length,
  pch = 19,
  col = colors[iris$Species],
  xlab = "Sepal.Length",
  ylab = "Petal.Length",
  main = "Sepal.Length vs Petal.Length(Basic)"
)
legend(
  "topright",
  legend = levels(iris$Species),
  col = colors,
  pch = 19,
  title = "Species"
)

# Task 02
boxplot(
  Sepal.Length ~ Species,
  data = iris,
  xlab = "Species",
  ylab = "Sepal.Length",
  main = "Task 02(Basic)"
)


# ggplot
# Task 01
ggplot(
  iris,
  aes(
    x = Sepal.Length,
    y = Petal.Length,
    color = Species
  )
) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  labs(
    title = 
      "Sepal.Length vs Petal.Length(ggplot2)",
    x = "Sepal.Length",
    y = "Patal.Length"
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = 
      c("setosa" = "red",
        "versicolor" = "green",
        "virginica" = "blue")
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top"
  )
```

### **用 ggplot 作图：`boxplot`**

用 `starwars` 的数据作图，画 `boxplot` 显示身高 `height` 与性别 `gender` 的关系。要求：

1.  `height` 为NA的，不显示；
2.  用`ggsignif`包计算 `feminine` 和 `masculine` 两种性别的身高是否有显著区别，并在图上显示。
3.  将此图的结果保存为变量 **`p1`** ，以备后面使用；

最终结果如图所示：

![](images/talk09-homework-plot01.png)

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
library(ggplot2)
library(ggsignif)

# Load the data
data("starwars")
starwars_filtered = 
  na.omit(starwars)

# Initializing the plot
# Ignore 'NA' in "height"
p1 =
  ggplot(
    starwars_filtered,
    aes(
      x = gender,
      y = height,
      fill = gender
    )
  ) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "Boxplot of Height by Gender",
    x = "Gender",
    y = "Height"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  )

# Calculate height
p1_with_signif =
  p1 +
  geom_signif(
    comparisons = 
      list(
        c("feminine", "masculine")
      ),
    map_signif_level = TRUE
  )

# Save it
p1 = p1_with_signif

print(p1)
```

### **用 ggplot 作图：使用`iris`做图**

用`geom_density2d`显示`Sepal.Length`和`Sepal.Width`之间的关系，同时以 `Species` 为分组，结果如图所示：

将此图的结果保存为变量 **`p2`** ，以备后面使用；

![](images/talk09-homework-plot03.png)

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
library(ggplot2)

# Draw the plot
p2 =
  ggplot(
    iris, 
    aes(
      x = Sepal.Length, 
      y = Sepal.Width, 
      color = Species
    )
  ) +
  geom_density2d() +
  geom_point(
    aes(color = Species), 
    size = 2, 
    alpha = 0.6) +
  labs(
    title = "Density Plot of Sepal.Length vs Sepal.Width by Species", 
    x = "Sepal.Length", 
    y = "Sepal.Width"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.title = element_blank()
  )

print(p2)

```

### **用 ggplot 作图：`facet`**

用 `mtcars` 作图，显示 `wt` 和 `mpg` 之间的关系，但用 `cyl` 将数据分组；见下图：

将此图的结果保存为变量 **`p3`** ，以备后面使用；

![](images/talk09-homework-plot04.png)

**注** 此图中的 `468` 组为所有数据合在一起的结果。

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
# 加载 ggplot2
library(ggplot2)

# 创建 facet 图形
p3 <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "Relationship between wt and mpg by cyl", x = "wt", y = "mpg") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) +
  facet_wrap(. ~ cyl,
             ncol = 2,
             dir = "h",
             scales = "free",
             drop = FALSE)

# 保存图形结果到变量 p3
p3

```

### **用 ggplot 作图：用`mtcars`做`polar`图**

用 `mtcars` 的 `mpg` 列做如下图，要求：先按 `cyl` 排序；每个`cyl`组内按 `mpg`排序； 将此图的结果保存为变量 **`p4`** ，以备后面使用；

**提示**

1.  先增加一列，用于保存 rowname : `mtcars %>% rownames_to_column()` **注**： 将行名变为列，列名为 `rowname`
2.  完成排序
3.  更改 rowname 的 factor
4.  计算每个 rowname 的旋转角度： `mutate( id = row_number(), angle = 90 - 360 * (id - 0.5) / n() )`

![](images/talk09-homework-plot05.png)

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
# 导入 ggplot2 和 dplyr 包
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

data(mtcars)

# Add a column to save row names
mtcars_named <- mtcars %>% rownames_to_column(var = "car_name")

# Sorted data
mtcars_arranged <- mtcars_named %>%
  arrange(cyl, mpg)

# Factors for changing line names
mtcars_arranged$car_name <- factor(mtcars_arranged$car_name, levels = mtcars_arranged$car_name)

# Calculate the rotation angle for each line name
mtcars_arranged <- mtcars_arranged %>%
  mutate(id = row_number(),
         angle = 90 - 360 * (id - 0.5) / n())

# Creating a Coordinate Chart
p4 <- ggplot(mtcars_arranged, aes(x = car_name, y = mpg, fill = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_polar(theta = "x") + 
  # scale_x_discrete(labels = mtcars_arranged$car_name) +
  # theme(axis.title.x = element_text(angle = (mtcars_arranged$angle))) +
  labs(title = "Pie Chart of mpg by cyl")


# Save to p4
p4

```

### **用`cowplot::ggdraw`将 `p1`, `p2`和`p3`按下面的方式组合在一起** 

注：需要先安装 `cowplot` 包

![](images/talk09-homework-plot06.png)

```{r}
## 代码写这里，并运行；
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)

# 将 p2 和 p3 组合在一起
combined_p2_p3 =
  plot_grid(p2,p3,nrow = 2, align = "v", axis = "l")
print(combined_p2_p3)

# 使用 ggdraw 组合 p1 和 combined_p2_p3

combined_plot =
  plot_grid(p1, combined_p2_p3, rel_widths = c(2.5,4))

ggdraw(combined_plot)

# 显示最终的组合图
print(combined_plot)

```
